title: Riot your servers shit out and I lost a ranked.
body: Can I have my LP back and loss prevented. I know it wasn't just me either because everyone in the game was having the problem and my two friends who i was skyping with ( who warned me when i was in champ select that the servers were shitting) were also having the same problem along with the people on their team. I think its BS that i lost because I give two kills to aatrox because I freeze and stand completly still in lane with 90 ping. So please fix your servers and give me my LP back. Please.

LOL well you were wrong ;)

I do not mean this as an offense to you, but if you play more ranked games, you will not be so concerned about the one or two you got disconnected from.

Shifting your perspective from "win every game" to "win more games than I lose" then little things like this won't bother you as much.

I have yet to personally experience these server issues, but you may be playing at more hours of the day than I am.

My thoughts.

-xN
